name: bigbluebutton
tagline: A virtual classroom platform for online teaching with video and collaboration
description: BigBlueButton is an open-source virtual classroom system designed for online teaching. It supports real-time audio, video, whiteboards, breakout rooms, and recording, all accessible through a web browser with no client software required.

features.title: Virtual Classroom
features.description: Complete online teaching platform with real-time interaction. Education reimagined

features.title: Audio & Video
features.description: High-quality conferencing with screen sharing capabilities. Crystal clear communication

features.title: Interactive Whiteboard
features.description: Collaborate visually with drawing and annotation tools. Engage students actively

features.title: Breakout Rooms
features.description: Split classes into smaller groups for focused discussions. Enhanced learning

features.title: Session Recording
features.description: Record classes for later review and absent students. Never miss content

features.title: Browser
features.description: No software installation required for participants. Instant access

features.title: Polling & Quizzes
features.description: Engage students with interactive assessments. Real-time feedback

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Self-host for complete control over your virtual classroom. Privacy and customization
